did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: Hoover Institution on War, Revolution and Peace. Domestic Studies Program working papers

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: Hoover Institution on War, Revolution and Peace. Domestic Studies

did.abstract: Relates to economics and political science. Selected working papers available in digital format on the Hoover Institution website: http://www.hoover.org/research/domestic-studies-program/working-papers

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to audiovisual materials requires at least two weeks advance notice. Audiovisual materials include sound recordings, video recordings, and motion picture film. Hoover staff will determine whether use copies of the materials requested can be made available. Some materials may not be accessible even with advance notice. Please contact the Hoover Institution Archives for further information.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Hoover Institution on War, Revolution and Peace. Domestic Studies Program working papers, [Box number], Hoover Institution Archives.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Acquired by the Hoover Institution Archives between 1980-2009.

accruals.head: Accruals
accruals.p: Materials may have been added to the collection since this finding aid was prepared. To determine if this has occurred, find the collection in Stanford University's online catalog Socrates at http://library.stanford.edu/webcat. Materials have been added to the collection if the number of boxes listed in Socrates is larger than the number of boxes listed in this finding aid.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content of Collection
scopecontent.p: Relates to economics and political science. Selected working papers available in digital format on the Hoover Institution website: http://www.hoover.org/research/domestic-studies-program/working-papers.

controlaccess.head: Indexing Terms
controlaccess.p: The following terms have been used to index the description of this collection in the library's online public access catalog.
controlaccess.subject: Economics.
Political science.
